subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN3259, how did it go?
description_text:
No he recibido los productos que he comprado, por favor ponerse en contacto
conmigo para buscar una solución. Gracias

El vie, 5 dic 2025 16:35, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> escribió:

> Hello Luis, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few
> seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

conversations.body_text: Hi luis santana,    I apologize for the delayed response. I see that all your packages have been delivered. Have you received them?  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1Z30AV566798022663/trackdetails
